Classes

Classes¶

Module for creating fractal trees

class fractal_tree.BinaryTree(x, y, length, scale, branch_angle, shift_angle)¶

A tree with 2 new branches per 1 old branch

class fractal_tree.Branch(start_node, end_node)¶

A Branch

get_angle()¶

Get angle beetween the branch and the horizont

get_dx()¶

Get the distance beetween the x-coordinates

get_dy()¶

Get the distance beetween the y-coordinates

get_length()¶

Get the length of the branch

class fractal_tree.Node(x, y)¶

A Node

copy()¶

Copy a Node

make_new_node(length, angle)¶

Make a new one from an existing one

move(dx, dy)¶

Move the node

class fractal_tree.PolyTree(x, y, length, scale, complexity, branch_angle)¶

A symetric tree with multiple branches created per grow step

get_branch_age_number(age=None)¶

Get the sum of branches grown in an specific age

get_branch_length(age=None)¶

Get the length of a branch

get_branch_number(age=None)¶

Get sum of all branches in the tree

grow()¶

Let the tree grow

class fractal_tree.Tree(x, y, length, scale)¶

The standard tree

grow()¶

Let the tree grow
